name: Anime Stickers NSFW
tagline: Anime and hentai-themed NSFW sticker packs for Telegram
description: Anime Stickers NSFW specializes in anime and hentai-style NSFW sticker packs. The channel features stickers based on popular anime series, original characters, and classic hentai art styles. Packs are organized by series and art style, making it easy to find stickers matching your favorite shows. Custom sticker requests are accepted from the community.
